name: JobTrain Web Tech Curriculum Resources
tagline: Slides and other resources for JobTrain's Web Tech Skills program
body:
##Basics
 * [Intro to Web Concepts](http://girldevelopit.github.io/gdi-featured-web-concepts) (Girl Develop It)
 * [Intro to the Command Line](https://jtcoders.github.io/intro-to-command-line)
 * [Web Domains](http://www.teaching-materials.org/domains/slides.html) (teaching-materials.org - needs updating)
 * [Web Hosting](http://www.teaching-materials.org/hosting/slides.html) (teaching-materials.org - needs major updates)
 * [Intro to Git & GitHub](http://girldevelopit.github.io/gdi-featured-git-github) (GDI)

##PhotoShop & Web Image Formats
 * [Guide to Image Formats](http://slides.com/verythorough/image-formats)
 * TODO: Basic Photoshop/Pixlr

##HTML & CSS
 * [Intro to HTML/CSS](http://www.teaching-materials.org/htmlcss-2day) (teaching-materials.org)
 * [CSS Positioning](https://jtcoders.github.io/positioning)
 * [Responsive Web Design](https://jtcoders.github.io/responsive-web-design)
 * [Intro to Bootstrap](https://jtcoders.github.io/bootstrap)
 * [HTML Multimedia](https://jtcoders.github.io/multimedia) (includes some JavaScript)
 * TODO: HTML email newsletters? Possible workshop by [GDI Phoenix](http://www.meetup.com/Girl-Develop-It-Phoenix/events/231330331/)

##JavaScript
 * [Intro to JavaScript](http://www.teaching-materials.org/javascript/) (teaching-materials.org)
 * [JavaScript and the DOM](http://www.teaching-materials.org/jsweb/slides/dom.html) (teaching-materials.org)
 * [Intro to jQuery](http://www.teaching-materials.org/jquery) (teaching-materials.org)
 * [More jQuery](http://www.teaching-materials.org/jquery2) (teaching-materials.org)
 * [AJAX](http://teaching-materials.org/ajax) (can be a bit complex)
 * [Public APIs](https://jtcoders.github.io/apis) (may want to simplify to show more services and reduce need for JavaScript)

##WordPress & Databases
 * [Intro to WordPress](https://jtcoders.github.io/intro-wordpress)
 * [Intro to Databases](http://hglennrock.github.io/gdi-intro-databases) (untested from GDI - probably too much depth)
 * [Intro to PHP & MySQL](https://www.girldevelopit.com/materials/intro-php) (GDI)
 * [WordPress Theme Development](https://jtcoders.github.io/wordpress-themes) (quite complex)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
